description: [``botocore``] Amazon Location Service now includes a MaxResults parameter for GetDevicePositionHistory requests.
[``botocore``] Amazon Polly adds new Catalan voice - Arlet. Arlet is available as Neural voice only.

[``botocore``] The release fixes the incorrect permissions called out in the documentation - DESCRIBE_TAG, ASSOCIATE_TAG, DELETE_TAG, ALTER_TAG. This trebuchet release fixes the corresponding SDK and documentation.
[``botocore``] Documentation only update to address tickets

[``botocore``] Added three new APIs to support tagging and resource-level authorization on Cost Explorer resources: TagResource, UntagResource, ListTagsForResource.  Added optional parameters to CreateCostCategoryDefinition, CreateAnomalySubscription and CreateAnomalyMonitor APIs to support Tag On Create.
